title: Lake Mead National Recreation Area: Parks as Classrooms
body: Parks as Classrooms        Field Trips If you would like to request a ranger-led field trip, you should: a) Email lake_education@nps.gov with your request b) After your date and location is confirmed, complete and submit an Education Fee Waiver (see below) 2-4 weeks before your visit, fee waivers cannot be guaranteed if the timeline is not met. This process is managed by our fee revenue office. ph:(702) 293-8798; fax: (702) 293-8800  All Field Trips
